sentences.en: Dickens contrasts the opulence of France's nobility with indigence of her peasants.
sentences.cn: 锹更斯比较法兰西贵族的富裕与其农民的贫穷.

sentences.en: Dickens contrasts the opulence of Frances nobility with the indigence of her peasants.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯将法兰西贵族的富裕与农民的贫穷作了对比.

sentences.en: For one of the poets has said, 'Application to business is the root of prosperity, but those who ask questions that do not concern them are steering the ship of folly towards the rock of indigence'.
sentences.cn: 有位诗人说道：心思用在生意上，乃是发财致富的根本； 凡是打听与此无关的问题的人，便是正在把愚蠢的船向贫穷的礁石撞去。

sentences.en: His present indigence is a sufficient punishment for former folly.
sentences.cn: 他现在所受的困苦足够惩罚他从前的胡作非为了.

sentences.en: The number of data is growing day by day, so a great deal of data is described as "data abundance, but information indigence ".
sentences.cn: 数据量与日俱增，大量的数据被描述为“数据丰富，但信息贫乏”。
